onlineAddresses.caption: Amber Rae | How to Navigate Your Emotions & Thrive

speakerTopic.text:
We are born with wonder but life teaches us to worry. In this conversation, bestselling author and artist Amber Rae invites audiences to return to wonder by facing their fears, navigating their discomfort, and rewriting the "worry myths” in their minds. 

Through a thoughtful blend of vulnerability, soulfulness, and science, Amber Rae guides audiences in expressing the fullness of who they are and the gifts they're here to give. They will leave feeling empowered to listen to their emotions rather than silence them and encouraged to seize their dreams.
speakerTopic.title: Choose Wonder Over Worry: Move Beyond Fear and Doubt to Unlock Your Full Potential

speakerBioSummary.text:
• Amber Rae is an international bestselling author, artist, and global advocate for creativity, self-discovery, and emotional wellness.
  • She transforms the way millions of people relate to their emotions through her viral art, sold-out venues, and bestselling books: Choose Wonder Over Worry, The Answers Are Within You, and The Wonder Journal.
  • Fortune calls her a "Millennial Motivator", and global wellness hub mindbodygreen called her "The Brené Brown of Wonder."
  • Her writing and art reach millions of people per month in nearly 200 countries, and her work has been featured in The New York Times, NYMag, TODAY, SELF, Forbes, and Entrepreneur.
  • As a keynote speaker and learning facilitator, Amber has spoken and led workshops at celebrated brands Kate Spade, Microsoft, Merrill Lynch, Lululemon, Unilever, and SAP, among others.
  • Through her website and popular social media channels, Amber has launched public art movements, global journaling challenges, and life accelerator programs.

speakerBiography.text:
Amber Rae is an international bestselling author, artist, and global advocate for creativity, self-discovery, and emotional wellness. She has been transforming the way millions of people relate to their emotions through her viral art, sold-out venues, and bestselling books.

She published bestsellers Choose Wonder Over Worry: Move Beyond Fear and Doubt to Unlock Your Full Potential, The Answers Are Within You: 108 Keys to Unlock Your Mind, Body & Soul, and The Wonder Journal: A Guide to Explore Your Emotions.

Her writing and art reach millions of people per month in nearly 200 countries, and her work has been featured in The New York Times, NYMag, TODAY, SELF, Forbes, and Entrepreneur. Fortune calls her a "Millennial Motivator", and global wellness hub mindbodygreen called her "The Brené Brown of Wonder."

As a keynote speaker and learning facilitator, Amber has spoken and led workshops at celebrated brands Kate Spade, Microsoft, Merrill Lynch, Lululemon, Unilever, and SAP, among others. Through her website and popular social media channels totaling over 400K followers, she's launched public art movements, global journaling challenges, and life accelerator programs.

Raised in Chicago, Amber currently lives in Topanga Canyon, California with her partner John, and her wild cat, Ninja.
